sentence: In February, she earned the ire of Senate Minority Leader Mitch McConnell after she participated in a conference organized by a white nationalist, and in October, she drew criticism for announcing, on the House floor, that her moderate Republican colleague Rep. Liz Cheney was a joke? for participating in an investigation of the Jan. 6 Capitol attack, which Greene has been accused of helping to incite.
author: Nik Popli
title: One of Marjorie Taylor Greene's Primary Challengers is Raking in Republican Cash
